text:
:loudspeaker: *Open position alert*

*Position:* Sales Associate (Self-Employed)

*Company:* Startup HubSpot Agency, UK

*Role:* Seeking an experienced Sales Associate with a strong sales background, especially in the marketing and sales sector. The candidate should have a good network of potential clients, particularly those using or interested in HubSpot.

*Responsibilities:*
• Identifying potential HubSpot user clients.
• Engaging with prospects and arranging consultations.
• Utilizing networks and strategies for new lead generation.
• Collaborating for smooth client onboarding.
*Requirements:*
• Proven sales experience, ideally in marketing/sales.
• Established potential client network.
• Strong communication and negotiation skills.
• Familiarity with HubSpot preferred.
• Ability to work independently and part-time.
*Application:* Send CV and cover letter demonstrating relevant experience and approach to the role.

This is an exciting opportunity to join a growing HubSpot agency in the UK and play a key role in their expansion.
We're extending an offer to someone this morning, Alex.
